ModMetaData.name: Flags and Banners (Continued)
ModMetaData.author: Mlie
ModMetaData.description:
[img]https://i.imgur.com/buuPQel.png[/img] Update of Sadjuuks mod https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=1564928794
- Added flags in this version Green Badger Snake Gryffon Raven Union Jack
- There is also a companion mod [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2578022517]Flags and Banners (Canons Expansion)[/url] by author Canon with even more flags
[img]https://i.imgur.com/pufA0kM.png[/img]
[table] [tr] [td][url=https://invite.gg/Mlie][img]https://i.imgur.com/zdzzBrc.png[/img][/url][/td] [td][url=https://github.com/emipa606/FlagsAndBanners][img]https://i.imgur.com/kTkpTOE.png[/img][/url][/td] [/tr] [tr] [td][img]https://i.imgur.com/WjDSfUn.png[/img][/td] [td][img]https://i.imgur.com/Be8E2qJ.png[/img][/td] [/tr] [/table]
[img]https://i.imgur.com/Z4GOv8H.png[/img]
This is a Haku 10 request : Only the Flags and Banners from UN-Colony mod. They need the carpet research.
[h1]For complete mod :[/h1] 1- UN-Colony : https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2019774245 2- UN-Furniture : https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2019774854
[img]https://i.imgur.com/PwoNOj4.png[/img] [list] [*] See if the the error persists if you just have this mod and its requirements active. [*] If not, try adding your other mods until it happens again. [*] Post your error-log using [url=https://steamcommunity.com/workshop/filedetails/?id=818773962]HugsLib[/url] and command Ctrl+F12 [*] For best support, please use the Discord-channel for error-reporting. [*] Do not report errors by making a discussion-thread, I get no notification of that. [*] If you have the solution for a problem, please post it to the GitHub repository. [/list]
